talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Really?! You're not going to give me an
answer? That's horrible!<sp:0:4:0>I've spent so long agonizing over this...<sp:5:1:0>
talk_1021: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>A way to defeat that wretched hero!
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Hey! I'm clearly struggling here! Aren't
you supposed to swoop in and help?<sp:0:4:0>I've spent so long agonizing over this...<sp:5:1:0>
talk_1011: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>A way to defeat that awful hero!
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmm... Just which combination <sp:5:0:0>will let
me win?<sp:5:0:0>
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Huh. Odd to see anyone else down here.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I'm drawing up schematics for things that
use Zonai devices.<sp:0:4:0>I was trying to figure out the perfect
combination of gadgets...

<sp:3:0:2:0500>But I just keep coming up empty.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Oh, I know!<sp:5:0:0>


What do you hate more? Things that are
burny or things that are freezy?
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Chat_01>Interesting. <sp:5:1:0>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> Yes! Now I KNOW
I can make something good!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Wait right there and I'll put it together!
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You connect the flame emitter here, and...
last but not least, drive a stake here.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> I'm not sure I ever would have
finished it on my own!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Honestly, your feedback was exactly what
I needed...
talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Who better to design a trap to defeat
the hero than the hero himself?!
talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You connect the frost emitter here, and...
last but not least, drive a stake here.<sp:5:0:0>
